scripts.db:seed: bin/console app:seed-destinations --count=10 && bin/console app:seed-resorts --count=5 && bin/console app:seed-amenities && bin/console app:generate-embeddings --entity=all
scripts.db:seed:full: bin/console app:seed-destinations --count=75 && bin/console app:seed-resorts --count=10 && bin/console app:seed-amenities && bin/console app:generate-embeddings --entity=all
scripts.db:seed:safe: php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-destinations --count=10 && php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-resorts --count=5 && php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-amenities && bin/console app:generate-embeddings --entity=all
scripts.db:seed:full:safe: php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-destinations --count=75 && php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-resorts --count=15 && php -d memory_limit=1G bin/console app:seed-amenities && bin/console app:generate-embeddings --entity=all
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:clear && npm run db:seed && npm run messenger:consume:limit
scripts.db:reset:full: npm run db:clear && npm run db:seed:full && npm run messenger:consume
scripts.db:reset:safe: npm run db:clear && npm run db:seed:safe && npm run messenger:consume:limit
scripts.db:reset:full:safe: npm run db:clear && npm run db:seed:full:safe && npm run messenger:consume
